name: aqua-agent
description:
Aqua Container Security Platform - agent component.



The Aqua Container Security Platform provides full development-to-production lifecycle controls for securing containerized applications, running on-premises or in the cloud, on Windows or Linux.
preInstallNotes: Deploy aqua-web and aqua-gateway before agents.
postUninstallNotes: Aqua agent master container has been removed. However, you will need to SSH into the nodes and run the Aqua uninstall script to completely remove Aqua.
